snippet: Chief among player grievances is dissatisfaction with compensation at Grand Slam tournaments, for which players said their share was as low as 5 percent to 15 percent.
lead_paragraph: Chief among player grievances is dissatisfaction with compensation at Grand Slam tournaments, for which players said their share was as low as 5 percent to 15 percent.

headline.seo: Grand Slam Purses Sore Point for Players
headline.main: Purses Are a Sore Point for Players at Majors
headline.print_headline: Purses Are a Sore Point For Players at Majors
